name: Sketchy House Flipper
description:
SKETCHY HOUSE FLIPPER is a parody on house flipping tv shows where you are hired by a famous "Celebrity House Flipping TV Couple" to do their dirty work. Damage homes to lower the purchase price, get chased by grandmas, and don't get caught! Check your ethics at the door.



MEET YOUR EMPLOYERS
Mike & Katie are your favorite celebrity house flipping TV couple. They are always on the lookout for their next house to buy, fix up, and sell for a HUGE profit. To make the largest profit, they need to purchase homes DIRT CHEAP! However, due to their celebrity status, they can't be seen in public ripping grandmas off...which is where you come in.

You have been hired to damage homes in the area, so Mike & Katie can swoop in and buy the homes for as cheap as possible!


KEY FEATURES:

  • Sneak around homes, garages, and backyards
  • Find keys to unlock doors to new areas
  • Complete a to-do damage checklist on each home
  • Get chased by sweet ol' grandmas
  • Use distractions to buy you more time by turning on TVs, radios, etc.
  • And most important of all...DON'T GET CAUGHT!

CAREFUL...the grandmas may seek revenge for getting ripped off!



SKETCHY HOUSE FLIPPER was created by Kirt Olson. It is his first commercial game and the result of 1.5 years of learning how to code and make games part-time while working a full-time job with a family.
